name: EXECUTIVE LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE

parties: EXECUTIVE LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed.
Messrs. Justice Larsen and Flaherty dissent.

casebody.head_matter:
623 A.2d 322
EXECUTIVE LIFE INSURANCE COMPANY, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, BOARD OF FINANCE AND REVENUE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1993.
Decided April 30, 1993.
William Y. Rodewald, Pittsburgh, Richard R. Tarantine, Pittsburgh, for appellant.
John Butchar, for appellee.
